text.div:
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/pacio-rat/CodeSystem/prat-service-type-cs defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
oasis OASISCMS Home Health Outcome and Assessment Information Set
mds MDSCMS Minimum Data Set - Resident Assessment and Care Screening
pt Physical Therapy AssessmentPhysical Therapy Assessment

name: TimepointServiceTypeCodeSystem
title: Timepoint Service Type Code System
publisher: HL7 Community-Based Care and Privacy Working Group

contact.name: HL7 Community-Based Care and Privacy Working Group

description: Codes describing various service types of clinical assessment or instrument that a timepoint is centered on.

concept.definition: CMS Home Health Outcome and Assessment Information Set
CMS Minimum Data Set - Resident Assessment and Care Screening
